string-array.item: a rigid, external layer that is specifically designed to provide structural support.
is found in all cells and separates the interior of the cell from the outside environment, it consists of a lipid bilayer that is semipermeable.
A type of plastids are sites of photosynthesis, converting sunlight into energy for growth.
Tiny cell sacs hold water and molecules, support the cell, and maintain its Turgor pressure.
